EngLawName: Sanitation Standard for the Tolerance of Heavy Metals in Mushrooms
LawName: 食用菇類重金屬限量標準
EngLawHistories:
1.Food No. 0960404397 Announced, 6/29/2007
2.Amended on August 20, 2013
3.Abolished on August 15, 2019

EngLawArticles.EngArticleContent: This Standard is prescribed in accordance with the provisions of Article 17 of the Act Governing Food Sanitation.
This Standard applies to the carpophores. Mycelium is not included.

Maximum tolerance of heavy metals:
┌─────────┬────────────────────┐
│Heavy metal       │Maximumtolerance（dry weight basis）    │
├─────────┼────────────────────┤
│Lead              │Not more than 3 ppm                     │
├─────────┼────────────────────┤
│Cadmium           │Not more than 2 ppm                     │
└─────────┴────────────────────┘
This Standard shall be implemented from the date of promulgation.
